parameters.name: Domain
parameters.description: The domain name whose DNS record you want to query.

parameters.name: IpVersion
parameters.description:
The IP version of the asset that is protected by Cloud Firewall. Valid values:

*   **4**: IPv4 (default)
*   **6**: IPv6

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the response.

Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese (default)
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.
